dct_title_s: A new map of North America, with the West India Islands: Divided according to the preliminary articles of peace, signed at Versailles, 20 Jan. 1783, wherein are particularly distinguished the United States, and the several provinces, governments & ca. which compose the British Dominions; laid down according to the latest surveys, and corrected from the original materials of Goverr. Pownall, Member of Parliament. 1783.
dct_description_sm: Probably from Thomas Kitchen et. al. A General Atlas... (London, R. Sayer & J. Bennett, 1782-[1787] maps no. 30-31; see Phillips no. 3522. Insets: A particular map of Baffin and Hudson's Bay - The passage by land to California... 1 map on 2 sheets: col.; 52 x 117 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
